DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study was to measure the inspired gas temperature and humidity of the anesthetic circuit in the Dr√§ger Primus machine and esophageal temperature with or without and heat and moisture exchanger (HME) and low-flow gas during anesthesia in patients submitted to gynecological surgeries.
DOC.brief_title: Heat and Moisture Exchanger and Low-flow Gas
DOC.criteria: Women 18 to 69 years old Gynecological Obesity Fever Endocrine disease
